description.narrative: Support strategic interventions programs and operations, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The Cooperation Programme (2008-2015) is monitored, evaluated and disseminated in a timely and effective manner, managing information, knowledge and experience efficiently to achieve its goals.
